NAME:
   getenvoy - Manage Envoy lifecycle including fetching binaries and collection of process state.

USAGE:
   getenvoy [global options] command [command options] [arguments...]

VERSION:
   dev

COMMANDS:
   run    Runs Envoy and collects process state on exit. Available builds can be retrieved using `getenvoy list`.
   list   List available Envoy version references you can run
   fetch  Downloads a version of Envoy. Available builds can be retrieved using `getenvoy list`.

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --home-dir value  GetEnvoy home directory (location of downloaded artifacts, caches, etc) (default: ${HOME}/.getenvoy) [$GETENVOY_HOME]
   --help, -h        show help (default: false)
   --version, -v     print the version (default: false)
